mapper.select: SELECT AUTHOR_CODE AS "authorCode", AUTHOR_NM AS "authorNm", AUTHOR_DC AS "authorDc", AUTHOR_CREAT_DE AS "authorCreatDe", (SELECT COUNT(B.AUTHOR_CODE) FROM TN_FEIS_MENUCREATDTLS B WHERE B.AUTHOR_CODE = A.AUTHOR_CODE ) AS "chkYeoBu" FROM TN_FEIS_AUTHORINFO A WHERE A.AUTHOR_CODE like CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
SELECT COUNT(AUTHOR_CODE) AS "totcnt" FROM TN_FEIS_AUTHORINFO WHERE AUTHOR_CODE like CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')

SELECT A.MENU_NO AS "menuNo" , A.MENU_ORDR AS "menuOrdr" , A.MENU_NM AS "menuNm" , A.UPPER_MENU_NO AS "upperMenuId" , (SELECT COUNT(B.MENU_NO) FROM TN_FEIS_MENUCREATDTLS B WHERE B.MENU_NO = A.MENU_NO AND B.AUTHOR_CODE = #{authorCode}) AS "chkYeoBu" FROM TN_FEIS_MENUINFO A WHERE A.MENU_NO > 0 ORDER BY A.MENU_ORDR
